Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Diabetes, Gestational

Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder by Site/Non-Neoplastic Endocrine Disorder/Glucose Metabolism Disorder/Diabetes Mellitus/Gestational Diabetes Mellitus
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Diabetes mellitus induced by PREGNANCY but resolved at the end of pregnancy. It does not include previously diagnosed diabetics who become pregnant (PREGNANCY IN DIABETICS). Gestational diabetes usually develops in late pregnancy when insulin antagonistic hormones peaks leading to INSULIN RESISTANCE; GLUCOSE INTOLERANCE; and HYPERGLYCEMIA.
